entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
